metadata.name: 17,731 First Steps
metadata.description:
Watch the making-of: https://youtu.be/jv3GijkzIdk See it up close: http://andrewprice.art/17731-first-steps

This mosaic contains 17,731 CG donuts created by artists all over the world who watched Andrew Price's Blender donut tutorial.

Each donut was sent in by the artist, rendered by Andrew, and formed into a mega donut over the course of a year.

100% of the sale proceeds are being donated to the Blender Development fund, to help millions more beginners around the world discover the joy of art.

21,800x21,800 - Digital, Blender.
